name: SODIUM CHLORIDE 0.9%

indications.text: used regulate balance water electrolytes body .

warningsAndPrecautions: plastic infusion bag ( non-pvc co-extruded film , double hard tube , easy fold , double valve double plug ) . 50ml/ bag , 100ml/ bag , 250ml/ bag , 500ml/ bag , 10o0ml/ bag . plastic infusion bag ( non-pvc co-extruded film , double hard tube , easy fold , double valve double plug , double aseptic packaging ) . 50ml/ bag , 100ml/ bag , 250ml/ bag , 500ml/ bag , 1000ml/ bag .
indications_original: It is used to regulate the balance of water and electrolytes in the body.
contraindications_original: Intravenous infusion, dosage according to the need of the disease.
